name: Procedural Terrain Generation (Rollingjack)
description:
Final Year College Project

Prototype of a sandbox game which uses the diamond square algorithm generate terrain. Players start the game in their home base and by accessing the menu can swap between home base and wilderness.

Controlls:

Movement: a/s/d/w

Interact: Left Click

Switch Tools: 1/2/3/4

Menu: m

Inventory/Crafting: i

During building

Place object: left click
